imdb.title: Seirei Tsukai no Blade Dance
imdb.plot: In a world where spirits exist and only pure maidens have the privilege of contracting with the spirits maidens from noble families gather at Areishia Spirit Academy where they are trained and given an Elite's education in order t...

episodes.title: The Blade Dance at Midnight
episodes.plot: Rinslet and Claire fight over Kamito, as both vie for his attention. The knights show up and disrespect the ladies. This leads to a war of wits. They all decide to meet and have a duel.

episodes.title: The Holy Sword That Killed the Demon Lord
episodes.plot: The dueling teams have bigger fish to fry when they find themselves battling an evil demon spirit, bigger than they can handle.

episodes.title: The Strongest Blade Dancer
episodes.plot: There's a contracting ceremony this afternoon in which Claire's involved.

episodes.title: The Lost Queen
episodes.plot: Everyone wants Kamito to join their team, but his allegiance lies with Claire. Meanwhile, a girl of noble order transfers to their school and Kamito is asked to protect her.

episodes.title: The Successor of the Demon Lord
episodes.plot: Princess Fianna just got to Areishia Spirit Academy and she's already causing problems. For one, she challenges Claire Rouge to a duel.

episodes.title: The Battle of the Mining City
episodes.plot: Rinslet, Claire, Est, and Fianna fight for affection and time with Kamito as they all set on a new mission, only to find Ellis Fahrengart.

episodes.title: Team Scarlet
episodes.plot: The madness has worked its way to a fever pitch as Kamito and the ladies come to a battle - which includes bloodstones and an altar - that is much bigger than they could've ever imagined. Meanwhile, Fianna reveals a big and bold secret to the team.

episodes.title: Covenant of the Wind
episodes.plot: As it's almost the Festival of Valentia and you're supposed to give chocolate to your crush, we find the girls slaving away in the kitchen to impress Kamito. A lunch outing presents a strange new girl that could be up to something behind the scenes.

episodes.title: Sylphid
episodes.plot: Ellis asks Kamito to join Sylphid, her Bladedance team, and he reluctantly says yes in return for some compensation.

episodes.title: The Night of Valentia
episodes.plot: Ellis' sister is drunk with power as she practically blows up the entire town in her wake.

episodes.title: Ren Ashbell
episodes.plot: Be prepared for a battle like no other as the girls must fight against their strongest opponent yet. Will Kamito be able to help now that he's injured.
